tool_description:
The Quizy API is a powerful tool that allows developers to create and customize quizzes programmatically. With this API, you can generate a wide variety of quizzes on different topics, ranging from educational quizzes for students to fun quizzes for entertainment purposes.

The API provides a simple and intuitive interface to generate quizzes based on parameters such as the number of questions, difficulty level, topic, and format. It leverages a vast repository of questions and answers, ensur...
name: Quizy API
title: Quizy API

api_list.name: /generateQuiz
api_list.description: This endpoint will return you the 5 questions, options, correct answer and explaination for the quiz topic you provide.

body.question: Which type of object helps represent multiple items?
body.explanation: An array is a data structure for storing multiple items in a single object.

body.question: Which fruit is often incorrectly attributed a citrus flavour?
body.explanation: Although pineapple has a sweet taste, it does not contain citrus flavouring.

body.question: Which of the following birds is the fastest?
body.explanation: Eagles are the fastest flying bird, capable of reaching speeds of more than 200mph.

body.question: What is the capital city of Brazil?
body.explanation: Brasilia is the capital of Brazil since 1960.

body.question: Which of the following programming language will you choose for developing web applications?
body.explanation: Java is a platform independent programming language providing better portability and securtiy, thus making it suitable for developing web applications
